statements: DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1 AND researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND funding_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM research_findings WHERE project_id = 1 AND finding_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%coronavirus%'
DELETE FROM research_locations WHERE project_id = 5 AND location_name = 'Research Site A';
DELETE FROM research_team WHERE project_id = 100 AND researcher_id = 5;
